sources.title: Shadow Fighter | Full Movie | Action Drama | Steve Daron | Burt Reynolds
sources.description:
Reggie, an inner-city teen struggling with the murder of his brother and the drug dealers who pulled the trigger, forms an unexpected bond with a homeless ex-boxer, "Lightning" Rhodes.
2017.  Stars: Steve Daron, Burt Reynolds, Omar Shariff Brunson Jr.

metadata.Plot: A homeless ex-boxer and an inner-city kid's unlikely bond helps them face their future, while fighting the tragedy from their past.
metadata.Writer: Alyn Darnay, Steve Daron, Lloyd S. Wagner
metadata.Actors: Steve Daron, Burt Reynolds, Omar Shariff Brunson Jr.
